C-13-S

PhD Candidate in Informatics

igraph example: edge-labeled graph or weighted graph

July 23rd, 2010
Here is an example of how to create a edge-labeled graph using igraph. [sourcecode] > a a [,1] [,2] [,3] [1,] 0 2 1 [2,] 2 0 3 [3,] 1 3 0 > g1 g1 Vertices: 3 Edges: 6 Directed: TRUE Edges: [0] 0 -> 1 [1] 0 -> 2 [2] 1 -> 0 [3] 1 -> 2 [4] 2 -> 0 [5] 2 -> 1 > E(g1)$weight [1] 2 1 2 3 1 3 > E(g1) Edge sequence: [0] 0 -> 1 [1] 0 -> 2 [2] 1 -> 0 [3] 1 -> 2 [4] 2 -> 0 [5] 2 -> 1 > get.adjacency(g1, attr="weight") [,1] [,2] [,3] [1,] 0 2 1 [2,] 2 0 3 [3,] 1 3 0 [/sourcecode]
